newProperties.name: code
newProperties.description: Short, commonly recognized code of the licence (ie. CC_BY_SA)

newProperties.name: name
newProperties.description: Full, descriptive name of the license (ie. Creative Commons - Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs)

newProperties.name: description
newProperties.description: Short description of the license conditions

newProperties.name: url
newProperties.description: An url pointing to full license content

newProperties.name: attributionRequired
newProperties.description: Whether this license requires an attribution
